content.value:
Casa del Puerto Hostel & Suites is located in Manga, a peaceful district in a central area of Cartagena de Indias, close to all the touristic points.

In Casa del Puerto Hostel & Suites you can choose between different type of accommodations: Double room with private bathroom which features private bathroom, AC, 32' TV with Netflix; Our bigger private room, with a King size bed and private bathroom; Triple room which is perfect for families and features AC, 32' TV with Netflix; 4 beds dorm, each dorm has curtains, usb plugs, shelf, reading light, AC and ventilator, perfect for friends or solo travelers; Apartment suitable for 5 people.

Casa del Puerto Hostel & Suites features a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a bar and shared lounge in Cartagena de Indias. 1.6 km from San Felipe de Barajas Castle and 2.8 km from Cartagena's Walls, the property features a garden and a terrace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.
Guest rooms at the hostel are equipped with a seating area. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at Casa del Puerto Hostel & Suites also offer pool view.
Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a à la carte breakfast.
Bolivar Park is 3.3 km from Casa del Puerto Hostel & Suites, while Cartagena's Gold Museum is 3.3 km away. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 7 km from the hostel.

description.description: Casa del Puerto Hostel & Suites is a new, totally rebuilt Mansion. It will be your oasis of peace during your stay in Colombia. Start your day with our delicious included breakfast and then enjoy your time in our big patio, where you can soak yourself in the pool under the Colombian sun, have a fresh cocktail, have a bite in our restaurant.... or just chill.
